mapper.insert: insert into offer (OFFER_ID, OFFER_TYPE, OFFER_SYS_TYPE, OFFER_NAME, OFFER_SYS_NAME, OFFER_SYS_PY_NAME, OFFER_NBR, EXT_OFFER_ID, OFFER_DESC, EFF_DATE, MANAGE_GRADE, EXP_DATE, OFFER_PROVIDER_ID, BRAND_ID, VALUE_ADDED_FLAG, INITIAL_CRED_VALUE, PRICING_PLAN_ID, IS_INDEPENDENT, REMARK, MANAGE_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{offerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{offerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerSysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerSysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerSysPyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{manageGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offerProviderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{valueAddedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initialCredValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pricingPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isIndependent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update offer set OFFER_TYPE = #{offerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_SYS_TYPE = #{offerSysType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_NAME = #{offerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_SYS_NAME = #{offerSysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_SYS_PY_NAME = #{offerSysPyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_NBR = #{offerNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_OFFER_ID = #{extOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_DESC = #{offerDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MANAGE_GRADE = #{manageGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = #{offerProviderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, VALUE_ADDED_FLAG = #{valueAddedFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITIAL_CRED_VALUE = #{initialCredValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRICING_PLAN_ID = #{pricingPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_INDEPENDENT = #{isIndependent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_REGION_ID = #{manageRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where OFFER_ID = #{offerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select OFFER_ID, OFFER_TYPE, OFFER_SYS_TYPE, OFFER_NAME, OFFER_SYS_NAME, OFFER_SYS_PY_NAME, OFFER_NBR, EXT_OFFER_ID, OFFER_DESC, EFF_DATE, MANAGE_GRADE, EXP_DATE, OFFER_PROVIDER_ID, BRAND_ID, VALUE_ADDED_FLAG, INITIAL_CRED_VALUE, PRICING_PLAN_ID, IS_INDEPENDENT, REMARK, MANAGE_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE from offer where OFFER_ID = #{offerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select OFFER_ID, OFFER_TYPE, OFFER_SYS_TYPE, OFFER_NAME, OFFER_SYS_NAME, OFFER_SYS_PY_NAME, OFFER_NBR, EXT_OFFER_ID, OFFER_DESC, EFF_DATE, MANAGE_GRADE, EXP_DATE, OFFER_PROVIDER_ID, BRAND_ID, VALUE_ADDED_FLAG, INITIAL_CRED_VALUE, PRICING_PLAN_ID, IS_INDEPENDENT, REMARK, MANAGE_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE from offer
